titleStmt.title: Instrvctions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the Right Honourable Francis Lord Willoughby of Parham lord lietenant of the county of Lincolne and to the rest of the committee ordered by both the said houses to goe into that county and there put in execution these insuing instructions for the setling & preserving the peace of that county and city and the parts adjoyning.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. B. and are to be sold by John Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
